languages.text: "Если даже арбитр может преступить закон, то что говорить о других?"
"If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"
languages.original_text: "Если даже арбитр может преступить закон, то что говорить о других?"

traits.locale_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, then what is to be said about the rest?"
"If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, then what is to be said about the rest?"
"If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that bode for the rest of us?"
"If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that bode for the rest of us?"
"If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"
"If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

languages.text: 「アービトレイターでさえ法を破ることがあるのなら、他の人類に何が期待できる？」
languages.original_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターでさえ法を破ることがあるのなら、他の人類に何が期待できる？」

languages.text: "Wenn sogar Arbitratoren das Gesetz brechen können, was sagt das dann über den Rest der Menschheit aus?"
languages.original_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn sogar Arbitratoren das Gesetz brechen können, was sagt das dann über den Rest der Menschheit aus?"

languages.text: « Si même les arbitrators sont capables d'enfreindre la loi, que peut-on espérer du reste de l'Humanité ? »
languages.original_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: « Si même les arbitrators sont capables d'enfreindre la loi, que peut-on espérer du reste de l'Humanité ? »

languages.text: «Si hasta los Arbitrator son capaces de quebrantar la ley, ¿en qué lugar deja eso al resto de la Humanidad?».
languages.original_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: «Si hasta los Arbitrator son capaces de quebrantar la ley, ¿en qué lugar deja eso al resto de la Humanidad?».

languages.text: “既然连法务官都可能会违背律法，其余的人又会如何呢？”
languages.original_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: “既然连法务官都可能会违背律法，其余的人又会如何呢？”

languages.text: "Yargıcılar bile kanunları ihlal edebiliyorsa İnsanlığın geri kalanı ne yapsın?"
languages.original_text: "If even Arbitrators are capable of violating the law, what does that say about the rest of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcılar bile kanunları ihlal edebiliyorsa İnsanlığın geri kalanı ne yapsın?"
